name: multiplayer-games
description: Web application with singleplayer games: SNAKE, MINES, TETRIS, SUDOKU and multiplayer games: BATTLESHIP, PONG.. Used technologies: HTML, CSS, PHP, JS, MYSQL, SOCKET.IO + EXPRESS in enviroment NODE.JS. Link: https://www.games.samuelmichalcik.sk
author: Samuel Michalcik
